Package nl.inl.blacklab.index.config

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ConfigWithAnnotations  
    InputFormatReader.BaseFormatFinder  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ConfigAnnotatedField
    Configuration for annotated ("complex") fields in our XML
    ConfigAnnotation
    Configuration for a single annotation ("property") of an annotated field ("complex field").
    ConfigCorpus
    Settings that will be used to write the indexmetadata file for any corpus we create from this format.
    ConfigInlineTag
    Configuration for an XML element occurring in an annotated field.
    ConfigInputFormat
    Configuration for an input format (either contents, or metadata, or a mix of both).
    ConfigLinkedDocument
    Configuration for a linked document.
    ConfigLinkValue
    Configuration for linked document link values.
    ConfigMetadataBlock
    Configuration for a block of metadata fields.
    ConfigMetadataField
    Configuration for metadata field(s).
    ConfigMetadataFieldGroup
    Configuration for a group of metadata fields.
    ConfigProcessStep
    Configuration for a processing step on a value.
    ConfigStandoffAnnotations
    Configuration for a block of standoff annotations (annotations that don't reside under the word tag but elsewhere in the document).
    DocIndexerBase  
    DocIndexerChat
    Class to read files in (CHILDES) CHAT format.
    DocIndexerConfig
    A DocIndexer configured using a ConfigInputFormat structure.
    DocIndexerPlainText
    An indexer for tabular file formats, such as tab-separated or comma-separated values.
    DocIndexerTabular
    An indexer for tabular file formats, such as tab-separated or comma-separated values.
    DocIndexerXPath
    An indexer configured using full XPath 1.0 expressions.
    InputFormatReader
    Reads ConfigInputFormat from a YAML or JSON source.
    YamlJsonReader
    Base class for a class that interprets a JSON structure.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ConfigCorpus.TextDirection
    Text direction: left-to-right or right-to-left (and possible future values?)
    ConfigInputFormat.FileType
    Basic file types we support
    ConfigLinkedDocument.MissingLinkPathAction  
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    InputFormatConfigException
    Thrown when there's an error in the input format configuration.
